value.title: Game Ticker
value.toolTip: The settings for the 'Game Ticker' system.

value.title: Use global ticker?
value.toolTip: Defines if the global ticker should be used or not.

value.title: Global ticks per second
value.toolTip: Defines the tick rate of the global ticker.

value.title: Use unscaled time
value.toolTip: Defines if the global ticker uses unscaled time.

value.title: Global sync state
value.toolTip: Defines the sync state for the global ticker.

value.title: Sync state
value.toolTip: Defines the sync state for the ticker.

value.title: Tick rate
value.toolTip: Defines the tick rate for the ticker.
